prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with tentacle-like limbs and a vibrant blue color scheme.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles an octopus, featuring striking yellow accents and a fierce expression.
Show me a Pokemon with a unique design inspired by sea creatures, emphasizing its agility and strength.
Generate a fighting-type Pokemon that has a sleek, muscular build and a deep blue hue.
Make a creature that embodies the spirit of the ocean, with distinctive patterns and a playful demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in underwater environments, showcasing its adaptability and combat skills.
Give me a Pokemon that combines elements of strength and grace, with a captivating color palette.
